Offer Validity

12th September to 27th December 2025

Avail Now
Eligible Cards

All SBI Credit Cards excluding Corporate Cards, SBI Flipkart Credit Card, Paytm SBI Credit Card & Cashback SBI Credit Card.

Summary
Up to Rs 6,000 instant discount on select Apple products.
The offer starts on 12th September 2025 on online channels and on 19th September 2025 on offline (POS) channels
Offer is valid on the following product categories: 

iPhone

	

MacBook

	

iPad

	

Watch

	

Pods/Beats

Offer valid at select retail/ Apple reseller stores (POS), online LFRs & quick commerce websites via Pine Labs, Ezetap & Paytm aggregators
Offer valid at Amazon.in & Flipkart.
Offer also valid on EMI transactions.
Velocity check across different channels/aggregators during offer period as below:
POS, Online LFR & Quick commerce – 2 transactions per product category per card per aggregator combined across channels
Amazon – Single or multiple transactions allowed with Max cumulative. discount Rs 10,000 per card
Flipkart – 2 transactions per product category per card
Offer cannot be clubbed with any other existing OEM offer.
Offer not valid on Corporate, Flipkart SBI Credit Card, Paytm co-brand & Cashback cards
Steps to avail this offer

Shop for products with SBI Credit Card. For store listclick here.

For cashback eligible product list,click here.
